root.Summary: A short description of the problem, explicitly indicating the cause and type of error situation
root.Component: Name of the part or function of the product being tested
root.Version: The version on which the bug was found
root.Severity: The most common five-level system for grading the severity of a defect is: S1 (Blocker)S2(Critical)S3 (Major)S4 (Minor)S5 ( Trivial)
root.Author: Bug report creator
root.Assigned: Name of the person assigned to resolve the issue
root.Environment: Information about the environment where the bug was found: operating system, service pack, for WEB testing - browser name and version, etc.
root.Description: Steps to Reproduce, Result, Expected Result
